ygData.subject: RE: Any tips.....
ygData.msgSnippet: All I can say, Shada, is YUK. Cazic is the least appealing dungeon in the game (visually, and list camping wise), and it was way worse back in the Ruby newbie
ygData.messageBody:
All I can say, Shada, is YUK. Cazic is the least appealing dungeon in the
game (visually, and list camping wise), and it was way worse back in the
Ruby newbie days (when you were there).;)

-Martyn



at the risk of Kit becoming nauseous, i spent 19 to 38 all in cazic =)



but i was rushing. with my new character i like to go places i haven't

before. where i am now is Paw. the most i have ever seen is 24 ppl, and

the average is 2 groups max. its great exp for 32 to 35 in the front rooms.

and its new to me, i never fought there before the change or in beta.



Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard

Tyria Sarkin, L35 High Elf Wizard

<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server





>

> Heh heh, Brave Heart Madagan.

>

> I'm 28 days old and only 21st level. The problem is,

> leveling generally is

> boring. I get bored trying to stay in one place for long,

> much less at one

> camp. Whenever I see that someone stayed in the Highkeep

> basement for 3

> levels or is Cazic for 5 levels, I get that sick feeling in

> the pit of my

> stomach. If that's what it takes to level beyond 25 I never

> will. Doing

> those things is not fun for me in the least, and if the game

> isn't fun I

> won't play, pure and simple.

>

> Kit
